categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: The Weekly Luncheon is a short story appearing in the June 1996 Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook, written by Peter M. Schweighofer for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The story offers a look at the casual, public nature of espionage among many competing factions on the Bothan homeworld of Bothawui.
